name: Shift
overview: "Finally! After a long search, we managed to find a worthy successor to our mega-hit BEN. SHIFT EDITOR works with smaller, font-like graphics, but is a lot more complex and offers a variety of opponents and objects. The aim of the game is to sink all red hearts in the dark squares. Once this has been done, you will advance to the next level. So that everything doesn't stay as easy as it may sound now, there are also malicious walls (since when are walls malicious?) In the labyrinth, which have to be avoided. Published in Magic Disk 64 1990/02.
